Optional Deps.android-ndk: Build apps that use native code
Optional Deps.android-sdk-build-tools: Work with apks in the repository
Optional Deps.android-sdk-platform-tools: Ability to install apps to connected devices
Optional Deps.android-support-repository: Build apps using Maven or Gradle that use support libraries
Optional Deps.bzr: Download app sources that use bzr
Optional Deps.git: Download app sources that use git or svn (via git svn)
Optional Deps.mercurial: Download app sources that use hg
Optional Deps.rsync: Transfer repo files to the web server
